qas.question: What kind of vehicle offers basic transportation to people in Saint Helena?
Where does the minibus travel to?
On what days does the minibus take people into Jamestown?

context: <a0_0>A minibus<a0_0/> offers a basic service to carry people around Saint Helena, with most services designed to take people into <a1_0>Jamestown<a1_0/> for a few hours on <a2_0>weekdays<a2_0/> to conduct their business. Car hire is available for visitors.
